contact

Let's ride our bikes around the country and build houses for people that need them.

Who
Bike & Build
What
Design / Code
When
2015
Where
Carrboro, NC
Team
Alex Bloom

What started as an audited financial document has grown into one of the most important marketing tools for the organization, helping drive donations, partnerships, and rider participation. Through service-oriented cycling trips, Bike & Build benefits affordable housing and empowers young adults for a lifetime of service and civic engagement.

Final product

Architecting content

Card sorting to quickly experiment with the content we were given. This allowed us to discover a storyline that wasn't obvious at first glance. Fancy paper for the cards is key.

Style exploration

After looking through the previous year's report, we determined to create a unified visual experience with a bold and patriotic color palette, a clean layout system, and illustrative graphics.

Photo treatment

Thousands of beautiful images taken by participants vary greatly in style. Duotones drove the aesthetic and visual language; syncing with the typography.

Page load speed

Developed a custom single-purpose-class css library to accelerate our prototyping workflow.
